scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ndi hafi kujya mu mihango bwa mbere. Ni iki nkwiriye kwitega, kandi nakora iki ngo mbimenyere?
output: Kuba ugiye kujya mu mihango ni ikimenyetso cyiza cy'uko umubiri wawe ukura. Uzabona amaraso atukura cyangwa yijimye avuye mu gitsina cyawe. Birashobora kumara hagati y'iminsi 3 kugeza kuri 7. Ushobora kumva uremerewe mu nda (nk'uko igifu cyawe kimeze) cyangwa ubabara mu mugongo. Ni ngombwa kugira ibikoresho by'isuku (ipamba/pads) bihagije kandi ukajya ubihindura buri masaha 4-6. Jya ukaraba neza amazi n'isabune. Ni ibisanzwe kandi uramutse ugize ikibazo, jya uganira na mama wawe cyangwa umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Umubiri wanjye urahinduka cyane, byanteye urujijo. Ese ibyo bintu byose biba bite?
output: Ibyo ni ibimenyetso by'uko uri gukura! Iyo bita 'puberite'. Uzabyibuha cyangwa ubone ukuguru n'amaboko bigira imbaraga, amabere atangira gukura, kandi uzatangira kubona ubwoya ahantu hamwe na hamwe (nko munsi y'amaboko no ku gitsina). Byongeye, uzatangira kujya mu mihango. Burya buri wese aba afite umuvuduko we wo gukura, ntugire ubwoba, ni ibisanzwe.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Nabonye amabere yanjye atangiye gukura kandi ndumva mbifitiye isoni. Ese abandi nabo bimeze bityo?
output: Yego rwose! Amabere yawe ari gutangira gukura ni ikimenyetso gikomeye cya 'puberite', kandi ni ibisanzwe rwose kuri buri mukobwa. Abandi bagenzi bawe nabo bari muri urwo rugendo. Umuvuduko wo gukura uratandukanye. Ntugomba kugira isoni, ahubwo byemere nk'ikimenyetso cy'uko uri gukura. Ushobora kwambara ibyitwa 'brassiere' cyangwa 'sports bra' niba bituma wiyumva neza.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Mu gihe cy'imihango, ni izihe nama z'isuku mwampa kugira ngo nirinde kunuka cyangwa kwandura?
output: Isuku ni ngombwa cyane mu gihe cy'imihango. Icya mbere, jya uhindura ipamba (pad) buri masaha 4-6, kabone n'iyo amaraso yaba make. Icya kabiri, jya ukaraba igitsina n'amazi meza n'isabune igororotse (nta mpumuro ikabije) inshuro ebyiri ku munsi, ariko ukareka amazi akinjira imbere. Icya gatatu, jya woga buri munsi kandi wambare imyenda y'imbere isukuye. Ibi bizagufasha kwirinda impumuro mbi n'uburwayi.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: 'Ubwumvikane' (Consent) bivuga iki? Nshaka kumenya uburyo bwo kubusobanura neza.
output: Ubwumvikane bivuze kwemeranya no gushaka kugira ikintu runaka. Bivuze ko iyo umuntu agiye gukora ikintu kuri wowe cyangwa na wowe ukakikora kuri we, mugomba kubanza kubiganiraho, kandi umwe akabyemera ku bushake bwe. Ubwumvikane bugomba gutangwa neza, bwashobora gukurwaho igihe icyo aricyo cyose, kandi umuntu agomba kuba atinya (atari gukoreshwa imbaraga) kugira ngo abusobanure. Kwicecekera cyangwa gushyira amaso hasi si ubwumvikane.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Mfite inshuti nyinshi, ariko nshaka kumenya icyo umubano mwiza hagati y'inshuti uba ushingiyeho.
output: Umubano mwiza ugomba gushingira ku cyizere, kubahana, no gushyigikirana. Inshuti nziza ni izigushyigikira mu byiza, zikakuba inama niba ubikoze nabi, ariko zitagusabira gukora ibyo udashaka. Mwemerera umwe gutanga igitekerezo cye kandi mugakemura ibibazo mwihanganirana. Ntabwo zigushira ku gitutu cyangwa ngo ziguteke ku mutwe.

instruction: Hari abagenzi banjye bansaba gukora ibintu bitananiye. Nshaka uburyo bwo kubyanga batarambwira nabi.
output: Ni byiza ko uri gushaka uko wirinda ibyo udashaka. Kwitinya gutanga igisubizo cyangwa kwanga ni uburenganzira bwawe! Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, ndumva ntanyuzwe n'icyo gitekerezo,' cyangwa 'Oya, ibyo ntabwo ari ibyanjye.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Ushobora no kwigira inama yo kugenda uvuye aho. Inshuti nyanshuti zigomba kubaha icyifuzo cyawe.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Mpora nagereranya uko nsa n'abandi bakobwa kandi ndumva ntishimishijwe. Nakora iki ngo nibanzeho?
output: Burya buri wese aba ari mwiza mu buryo bwe bwihariye, kandi kwigereranya bishobora kukuriza agahinda. Menya ko itandukaniro riri hagati y'abantu ari ryo ryiza. Banze ibitekerezo byiza ku mubiri wawe. Jya ukora ibintu bikunezeza, kandi jya wita ku bumenyi bwawe n'ubushobozi bwawe. Uzamenye ko agaciro kawe kagwa ku bwo uri we mu mutima, atari uko usa.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ngiye kugenda njyenyine nijoro. Ni izihe ngamba nakwizera kugira ngo nirinde ikibi?
output: Kubanza kwitekerezaho ni intambwe ya mbere ikomeye. Mu gihe uri kugenda, jya ugenda ahantu hari urumuri kandi hari abantu benshi. Niba ushoboye, jya wirinda inzira z'ubusa. Jya uzitwara nta bintu byinshi mu ntoki, kugira ngo ushobore kugenda byihuse. Jya wizeye umuntu wizeye (umubyeyi, umuvandimwe) aho uri ugeze. Niba hari umuntu uguhagaritse ukamunenga, jya witabaza cyangwa ugende.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Ni iki cyandyoza kumenya ko imyitwarire y'umuntu kuri njye ari mibi cyangwa itari igikwiye?
output: Jya wizerwa mu bumenyi bwawe. Niba umuntu aguteye ubwoba, akakugeza impamvu mbi, akagukozaho agaseke cyangwa se akakubwira amagambo adakwiye, cyangwa se akagusaba gukora ibintu utifuza, ibyo birimo imyitwarire mibi. Niba wumva ufite ikibazo cyangwa se ubwoba, ibyo ni byo byakubera ikimenyetso cy'uko hari ikidasanzwe kirimo kuba.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Hari igihe nshaka kuvuga 'Oya' ariko nkagira ubwoba. Nshaka kumenya uko nabivuga bidasaba umuntu guhagarika cyangwa gutongana.
output: Ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya' mu gihe utanezerewe cyangwa se ubonye ko hari ikibazo. Ushobora kuvuga uti: 'Oya, sinshaka kubikora', cyangwa 'Oya, ntewe ubwoba n'icyo kintu.' Kuvuga 'Oya' bisobanura ko hari imipaka uriho. Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Hari igihe kibi kingezeho. Ese nshobora kuvugana na nde kugira ngo ngire inama, kandi ntangire kwicira n'ubwoba?
output: Ni ngombwa cyane kugira umuntu wizeye. Ushobora kuvugana na mama wawe, papa wawe, mwarimu wizeye, umuyobozi w'itorero, cyangwa se undi muntu mukuru uzi ko akwifuriza icyiza. Ni byiza ko umuntu wizeye yamenya ibyagukoreye. Ntugomba gushyira ibyabaye mu banga, kuko ukeneye ubufasha.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Nkunda gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, ariko hari abantu batuma ngira ubwoba. Ni izihe ngamba zo kwirinda nshobora kwifatira?
output: Jya ukingira 'privacy settings' zawe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga (social media). Ntugomba kwemera inshuti abantu utazi mu buzima busanzwe. Ntuzigere uhereza umuntu amakuru yawe bwite (adresi, telefone, amashuri). Niba hari umuntu ukuvugishije nabi cyangwa aguhagaritse, jya umuhagarika (block) kandi ubwire umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ni ayahe makuru yanjye bwite atagomba gutangazwa ku mbuga za interineti cyangwa se kuyaha abantu ntazi?
output: Hari amakuru ntarengwa. Ntuzigere utanga adresi y'iwawe, nomero ya telefone, izina ry'ishuri urangije, cyangwa amashusho yawe cyangwa se ay'umuryango wawe. Ntuzigere uvuga umubare w'ibanga (password) byawe. Ni ngombwa ko ubika aya makuru kugira ngo wikize ibyago.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when someone gives her unwanted attention
instruction: Hari umuntu uhora antera ubwoba cyangwa akampa amakuru adakwiye. Nakora iki ngo ntabikora?

Niba ubishaka, uzabwire umuntu mukuru wizeye (umuryango, abarimu) ko hari ubikubabaza, kugira ngo akugire inama.

scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Ndashaka kumenya ahantu nshobora kwizeza cyangwa se abantu nshobora kwizera, igihe mfite ikibazo.
output: Ahantu hizewe ni ahantu humura, hagaragarira umunyamakuru, kandi hari abantu badashobora kuguhagarika. Abo bantu ni abantu bakuru bubahaga, nko muri 'church', ku ishuri, cyangwa se mu rugo. Umuntu wizeye ni umuntu wumva ikibazo cyawe, akaguha ubufasha, kandi akabika amakuru yawe mu ibanga.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Mfite ubwoba bwinshi mu gihe ngezeyo cyangwa se ntangije gushyikirana n'abandi bantu. Ni ubuhe buryo bwo gukemura ubwo bwoba?

Niba ubwoba bugukabura, jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru cyangwa se umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Mfite agahinda gakomeye, sinishimye. Nshaka kumenya uburyo bwo gusenga kugira ngo nirengagize ibyo bintu.
output: Iyo wumva ufite agahinda gakabije, ni ngombwa kumenya ko ari ibisanzwe. Jya ushaka umuntu wizeye cyangwa se undi muntu mukuru ushobora kuganira na we. Jya uganira n'inshuti zawe cyangwa se umuntu wizeye. Jya ugerageza kwibanda ku byiza mu buzima bwawe. Uko urushaho gukora ibyiza, niko urushaho gukura.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ese ni ibisanzwe ko imihango yanjye isa n'iyihisha cyangwa se ikagenda vuba?
output: Mu myaka ya mbere, ni ibisanzwe ko umuhango uza n'igihe utari witeze cyangwa se ukagira umuvuduko utandukanye. Umubiri wawe uba uri gushaka uko wiyongera. Icyakora, niba ubona ko umuhango urimo gukabya cyane, cyangwa se ukagenda kenshi cyane, jya uganira n'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa muganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ni ngombwa kumenya uko umubiri wanjye ukora? Nakura iki mu bumenyi bwanjye?
output: Yego, kumenya umubiri wawe ni ngombwa. Bizagufasha kwita ku buzima bwawe, gufata ibyemezo byiza, no kwirinda uburwayi. Jya ushaka amakuru yizewe ku buvuzi bwawe, kandi uganire n'ababyeyi bawe cyangwa se abandi bakuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ese ni ibisanzwe ko amabere yanjye aba meza kuruta ay'abandi bakobwa bo mu ishuri?
output: Amabere y'abakobwa bose agira umuvuduko utandukanye, kandi agira ubwoko butandukanye. Ntabwo ugomba kwigereranya n'abandi. Amabere yawe arakura uko yishakiye. Jya wumva wihanganira, kandi wite ku byiza uri gukora. Wibuke ko buri wese ari mwiza mu buryo bwe.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese nshobora gukoresha ipamba (pads) cyangwa se 'tampons'? Ni iki gikomeye?
output: Kugira ngo usukure, ni ngombwa gukoresha ibikoresho by'isuku ubona ko bikoroheye. Ipamba (pads) ni byiza kuko ari byo byoroshye gukoresha. 'Tampons' zikoreshwa cyane, ariko zigomba gukoreshwa neza. Niba utazi uko wakoresha 'tampons', jya uganira n'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba umuntu yankoresheje imbaraga, nshobora kuvuga 'Oya' ryari, kandi nakora iki?
output: Ibyo ni bibi, kandi ntibyari bikwiye kubaho. Kuvuga 'Oya' ni uburenganzira bwawe, kandi ubwo bwumvikane bugomba gutangwa ku bushake. Jya uta kuri uwo muntu, kandi ubwire umuntu mukuru wizeye vuba na bwangu. Ufite uburenganzira bwo kubaho mu mahoro.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Inshuti yanjye impora ivuga ko inshuti zanjye z'abagore n'abapfakazi atari nziza. Ese uwo ni umubano mwiza?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari umubano mwiza. Umubano mwiza ushingira ku cyizere no kubahana. Inshuti yawe igomba kubaha amahitamo yawe ku nshuti zindi. Iyo umuntu ashaka kugukura ku bandi, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy'uko ashaka kugushyira ku gitutu. Ni ngombwa kugira inshuti nyinshi, ntabwo ugomba kuba wenyine.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zimpamagarira gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Nakora iki ngo mvuge 'Oya' ntangiye kubyanga?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' ku biyobyabwenge ni intambwe ikomeye yo kwirinda. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, ntabwo nshaka kubikora, kandi ndakwinginze ubaze undi muntu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Ushobora no kuvuga ko ufite ikindi kigomba gukora. Kwirinda ibiyobyabwenge ni ngombwa cyane ku buzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Ndi gutekereza ko ibiro byanjye bikabije. Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku mubiri wanjye.
output: Agaciro kawe ntikagombye guhagarara ku biro byawe. Ni byiza ko wita ku mubiri wawe ukoresheje kurya neza no gukora imyitozo. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi (ubwenge, umutima mwiza, impano). Kwizera ubwiza bwawe bizagufasha kwihangana. Niba ugomba gukemura ibibazo byawe by'ibiryo, jya uganira n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ndi gutinya umuntu uhora agenda inyuma yanjye mu muhanda. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya uhagarara, urebe inyuma, kandi uta kuri uwo muntu. Jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba mu rugo rw'inshuti. Niba ugomba, jya witabaza cyangwa se uhamagara umuntu mukuru wizeye. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwicuza.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Hari umuntu uhora ankoraho ku buryo ntarabona. Ese ibyo byaba ari ibyaha?
output: Yego. Iyo umuntu agukozaho agaseke atarabyemeye cyangwa se akakubangamira, ni ikimenyetso cy'uko ari imyitwarire mibi. Niba umuntu akora ikintu kigutera ubwoba, jya umusubiza uti 'Hagarara!' mu ijwi rirenga. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko navuga 'Oya' ku gitekerezo cy'umugenzi wanjye w'urukundo cyane, kandi ntagira ubwoba.
output: Ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya' mu gihe utanezerewe cyangwa se ubonye ko hari ikibazo. Ushobora kuvuga uti: 'Oya, sinshaka kubikora,' cyangwa 'Oya, ndumva bitari byiza.' Kuvuga 'Oya' bisobanura ko hari imipaka uriho. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Nabonye ikibazo cy'umugenzi wanjye, ariko sinzi uwo nabibwira kugira ngo ndamure. Nshaka ubufasha.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha vuba na bwangu. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye (umubyeyi, umuyobozi w'itorero, umujyanama w'ishuri). Ntuzigere ukomeza kwihisha ibyabaye. Ufite uburenganzira bwo kubaho mu mahoro.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Hari umuntu untera ubwoba kuri interineti kandi ntazi. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?
output: Jya uhagarika (block) uwo muntu, kandi ubwire ababyeyi bawe cyangwa undi muntu mukuru wizeye ibyabaye. Ntuzigere uhangana na we ku murongo. Jya wita ku 'privacy settings' zawe kugira ngo wikize ibyago.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ese nshobora gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wanjye kuri interineti kugira ngo ndamure?
output: Oya, ntugomba gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa se amakuru yawe bwite kuri interineti. Amakuru nk'ayo ashyira umuryango wawe mu kaga. Ntuzigere uhereza umuntu amakuru yawe bwite, nubwo mwaba mwaraziranye kuri interineti.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when someone gives her unwanted attention
instruction: Hari umuhungu uhora antera ubwoba n'amagambo adakwiye. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya ugerageza kumusubiza uti 'Hagarara!' mu ijwi rirenga. Niba adahagarara, jya umuhagarika (block) kandi ubwire umuntu mukuru wizeye. Niba ari hafi, jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba. Wibuke ko ufite uburenganzira bwo kwubahwa.
